health_discussed_people_names: Honourable Mwende, Hon. Omondi, Hon. Ibrahim, Hon. Thoya, Honourable Athumani Mwamwiri
health_data_challenges: Delayed response from the Department concerned, delayed remittance of finances from the national government, shortage of fuel supply, breakdown of machinery
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Summon the concerned CECM to explain delays, provide consistent fuel supply, ensure timely maintenance of trucks and machinery
health_evidence_base: Statement by Hon. Mwende on lack of response from the Department concerned
